name: Kibo Studios
tagline: DEVELOPMENT. DESIGN. WEB. APPS. ONLINE MARKETING
description: Founded in 2007 KIBO, which stands for "Hope" in Japanese, is a technology consulting firm specialized in development, design, and online marketing. Their enthusiasm and passion in every project has made them grow day by day with their customers. Some services offered include: web development, design, mobile apps development, web application development, custom software development, technical consultancy, software testing, system integrations, graphic design, and big data.
